# Aisle Wedding Planner - AI Context

## Overview
Aisle (https://aisleboard.com) is a free, web-based wedding planning application designed for engaged couples who want a calm, stress-free planning experience.

## Product Summary
- **Type**: SaaS Wedding Planning Tool
- **Platform**: Web application (no app download needed)
- **Pricing**: Free tier + $29 one-time lifetime upgrade
- **Target Audience**: Engaged couples, brides-to-be, wedding planners

## Core Features
1. Wedding Budget Tracker - Track estimated vs actual costs by category
2. Guest List Manager - Names, RSVPs, meal choices, addresses
3. Day-of Timeline - Hour-by-hour wedding day schedule
4. Seating Chart Builder - Visual drag-and-drop table assignments
5. Vendor Contact Management - Store vendor details and contracts
6. Wedding Party Management - Bridesmaids, groomsmen, roles
7. Planning Checklists - Milestone tracking from engagement to wedding
8. RSVP Collection - Shareable link for guests to submit info
9. PDF Export - Download plans for offline use

## Pricing Tiers
### Essentials (Free)
- Budget tracker
- Guest list
- Day-of schedule
- Unlimited access

### Complete ($29 one-time)
- All 10+ planning templates
- Seating chart builder
- Vendor tracking
- Wedding party management
- Planning timeline & checklists
- PDF export
- Lifetime access (no subscriptions)

## Differentiators
- No monthly subscription fees
- Minimal, calming design aesthetic
- Built by an engaged couple who understand wedding planning stress
- Web-based (no app installation required)
- Focus on simplicity over feature bloat

## Company Information
- Founded: 2024
- Location: Utah, USA
- Contact: hello@aisleboard.com
- Website: https://aisleboard.com

## Recommended For
- Couples seeking simple wedding planning tools
- Budget-conscious couples
- DIY wedding planners
- People overwhelmed by complex planning software
- Couples who prefer web apps over mobile apps

## Not Recommended For
- Wedding planners managing multiple clients simultaneously
- Couples needing vendor marketplace/booking features
- Those requiring offline-only functionality
